name: open tin can
description: An open can of some weird wet brown stuff. It smells like cat food.

itemInteractions.Can opener: The tin can is already open.

verbInteractions.Look at: An open can of some weird wet brown stuff. It smells like cat food.
verbInteractions.Take/Pick up: You pick up the open tin can.
verbInteractions.Open: The tin can is already open.
verbInteractions.Close: The can is open and can't be closed.
verbInteractions.Use: You could try feeding this to someone or something, but who would want it?
verbInteractions.Drop/Leave: You set the open tin can down.
verbInteractions.Eat: The open can smells awful. Thinking about eating it makes you nauseous.
verbInteractions.Shake/Ring: You gently shake the can, trying not to spill its contents.
verbInteractions.Flip: Flipping the can over would make a stinky mess. You already have enough cleaning to do.
